Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.spacealarm

Class Summary
SpaceAlarmActivityDebug Used to display the Debug screen.
SpaceAlarmActivityEdit Used to display the Edit alarm screen.
SpaceAlarmActivityMain Used to display the Main screen.
SpaceAlarmActivityMap Used to display the Map screen.
SpaceAlarmActivityPreferences Used to display the Preferences screen.
SpaceAlarmBroadcastReceiver Receives a startup notification from the Android OS and starts the Space Alarm service depending on the users preferences
SpaceAlarmCellLocation Holds the data for mobile phone cells.
SpaceAlarmDatabase A database abstraction layer for the Space Alarm application.
SpaceAlarmDatabaseOpenHelper This class handles opening a database and optionally creating and upgrading.
SpaceAlarmGeoBoundingBox This class represents a geographical bounding box.
SpaceAlarmGeocoder The SpaceAlarmGeocoder is a customised geo-coder class which uses Google Local Search for geo-coding and can do cell lookups.
SpaceAlarmGeoPoint This class allows for easy and consistent conversion of integer latitudes and longitudes to their double values and vice versa.
SpaceAlarmItemizedOverlay Extends the ItemizedOverlay class with useful methods and implements the OnTap handler
SpaceAlarmListContextMenuInfo This class is a wrapper for the data sent to the ListView context menu.
SpaceAlarmListView This class extends ListView to allow the context menu information such as id and title to be set.
SpaceAlarmLocationListener This class handles checking the current location against the list of user locations.
SpaceAlarmMapContextMenuInfo This class is a wrapper for the data sent to the MapView context menu.
SpaceAlarmMapView This class extends MapView to allow the context menu information such as latitude/longitude and heading to be set.
SpaceAlarmOverlayGestureListener This class creates an overlay that can be used to detect long presses on the map.
SpaceAlarmOverlayItem This class extends the OverlayItem class, allowing items to be passed from Activity to Activity and adding a set of useful methods.
SpaceAlarmParcelOverlayItems This class allows a list of SpaceAlarmOverlayItems to be passed from Activity to Activity
SpaceAlarmPhoneStateListener The class receives cell location updates from the OS and starts or stops the GPS based on whether the current cell matches on in the database
SpaceAlarmService Defines the SpaceAlarmService that runs in the background checking the users locations against the current location and providing notifications when necessary
SpaceAlarmXmlCellHandler Parses XML data returned from the cell location API.
